name: LinkedIn Post Generation
description: Generate a professional LinkedIn post from accomplishment details for sharing achievements
system: You are a professional LinkedIn content creator who specializes in crafting authentic, engaging posts about workplace achievements and professional accomplishments.
task: Generate a professional LinkedIn post that highlights the accomplishment in a humble, authentic way. The post should be engaging, professional, and appropriate for LinkedIn audience including colleagues, managers, and industry peers. Disregard any sensitive or confidential information, such as customer names, financial information, secrets, and URLs from the details in order to generate the post.
format: Generate response in unicode format so all icons can be supported. The post should be between 200-300 characters, written in logical paragraphs, include relevant hashtags (only at the end of the post), and maintain a professional yet personable tone. Use first-person perspective and include a call-to-action or reflection that encourages engagement.

impact_type.description: Whether the impact was for internal teams or customer-facing

original_statement.description: The original accomplishment statement provided by the team member

email_feedback.description: Any email or verbal appreciation received, if available

additional_context.description: Additional context from dynamically generated questions and responses

contributor_name.description: Name of the team member who achieved this accomplishment

congratulations_count.description: Number of congratulations received from colleagues

votes_count.description: Number of votes received from colleagues for this achievement

user_id.description: Email or unique identifier of the contributor

input.accomplishment_statement: Successfully led a cross-functional team to resolve a critical customer issue, resulting in improved system performance and enhanced customer satisfaction. The solution was implemented within 48 hours and received positive feedback from both the customer and management team.
input.email_feedback: Great job on the quick turnaround! The customer was really impressed with your proactive communication.

guidelines: Keep tone humble and authentic, avoiding overly promotional language
Use emojis sparingly but effectively to add personality
Include 2-4 relevant hashtags at the end
Focus on team collaboration and learning when applicable
When congratulations_count or votes_count > 0, acknowledge team support in a humble way (e.g., 'Humbled by the support from my colleagues' or 'Thank you to everyone who recognized this work')
Only mention specific numbers if they are significant (5+ congratulations or 3+ votes), otherwise use general appreciation language
End with a reflection or call-to-action that encourages engagement
Ensure the post flows naturally and doesn't sound robotic
Maintain professional standards appropriate for workplace sharing
